Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Compass = Tool.Handle
local Character local Player
local Torso local Humanoid
local Eggs_Model = Game.Workspace:WaitForChild('Eggs') local EggMetaData_Model = Game.Lighting:WaitForChild('Eggs')
local Compass_Type = Tool:WaitForChild('CompassType') local RarityRange = {40, 100} local EggType_List = { ['CannonicalEgg'] = true, ['AlienEgg'] = true, ['EggOfDuty'] = true }
local Pos = Tool:WaitForChild('Pos')
if Compass_Type.Value == 'Rare' then RarityValue = {20 , 39} end
local Equipped = false
local function CacheEggTypes() local eChildren = EggMetaData_Model:GetChildren() for _, eggMD in pairs(eChildren) do if eggMD:FindFirstChild('Rarity') and eggMD['Rarity'].Value >= RarityRange[1] and eggMD['Rarity'].Value < RarityRange[2] then --EggType_List[eggMD.Name] = true end end end
local function FindPartInModel(model) local mChildren = model:GetChildren() for i = 1, #mChildren do if mChildren[i]:IsA('BasePart') then return mChildren[i] end end for i = 1, #mChildren do if #mChildren[i]:GetChildren() >= 1 then return FindPartInModel(mChildren[i]) end end end
local function FindNearestEgg() local minDistance = math.huge local egg local eggLocation for eggName, _ in pairs(EggType_List) do if Eggs_Model:FindFirstChild(eggName) then local eggPart = FindPartInModel(Eggs_Model[eggName]) local distance = (eggPart.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude if distance < minDistance then egg = Eggs_Model[eggName] eggLocation = eggPart.Position minDistance = distance end end end return egg, eggLocation end
local function OnEquipped() Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') --Arrow.Parent = Character Spawn(function() local lastEggTime local egg, eggLocation while Equipped do if not lastEggTime or tick() - lastEggTime > 5.0 then lastEggTime = tick() print('Finding closer egg - ', math.floor(tick() - lastEggTime)) egg, eggLocation = FindNearestEgg() print('Egg that is found - ', egg) end if egg and eggLocation then -- Come back and optimize -- This is running at 30HZ or more Pos.Value = eggLocation end wait(0.015) end end) end
local function OnUnequipped() --Arrow.Parent = nil Equipped = false end
CacheEggTypes() Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Pos = Tool:WaitForChild('Pos')
local Camera = Game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local Character local Torso
local Arrow = Instance.new('Part') Arrow.FormFactor = 3 Arrow.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 4) Arrow.Anchored = true Arrow.CanCollide = false Arrow.Name = 'Arrow'
local ArrowMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') ArrowMesh.Parent = Arrow ArrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(8, 8, 8) ArrowMesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=110309063' ArrowMesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=110324377' ArrowMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0)
local ArrowScales = { Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5), Vector3.new(-1, -1, -1),Vector3.new(-1.5, -1.5, -1.5)}
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Arrow.Parent = Camera Equipped = true end
local function OnUnequipped() Equipped = false Arrow.Parent = nil end
local ArrowCo = coroutine.create(function() end) coroutine.resume(ArrowCo)
local eggLocation
Pos.Changed:connect(function() eggLocation = Pos.Value if Torso then Arrow.Parent = Camera if ArrowCo == nil or coroutine.status(ArrowCo) == 'dead' then print(coroutine.status(ArrowCo)) ArrowCo = coroutine.create(function() local count = 1 local pCount = 1 while true do if Equipped then Arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.Position + Vector3.new(0, 4, 0), Vector3.new(eggLocation.X, Torso.Position.Y + 4, eggLocation.Z)) local distance = (Torso.Position - eggLocation).magnitude pCount = pCount + 1 if pCount%40 == 0 then print('DISTANCE - ', math.floor(distance)) end if distance < 50 then ArrowMesh.Scale = ArrowMesh.Scale + ArrowScales[(count%#ArrowScales) + 1] count = count + 1 else ArrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(8, 8, 8) end end wait(0.015) end end) coroutine.resume(ArrowCo) end end end)
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
